entry.summary: How to use ? Enable in Security / Confidentiality the Install From everywhere Button sudo spctl --master-disable Show Hidden Files defaults write com.apple.finder AppleShowAllFiles -boolean true; killall Finder Hide Hidden Files defaults write com.apple.finder AppleShowAllFiles -boolean true; killall Finder Display IP Adress ifconfig | grep "inet " | grep -v 127.0.0.1 | cut -d\ -f2 Fl...

entry.summary: AppCenter data for Fastlane For example in this url : https://appcenter.ms/orgs/ToTo/applications owner_name : ToTo app_name: Your AppName app_platform: iOS (Obj-c/swift) / Android (Java) api_token: Go to https://appcenter.ms/orgs/YOUR_ORG/apps/YOUR_APP_NAME/settings/apitokens & generate one ! You are ready ! iOS Generate necessary stuff in Apple Developer Portal Generate App...

entry.title: ‚≠ê Setup Mobile Development Environment (Tested on macOS M1+Intel)

link.title: ‚≠ê Setup Mobile Development Environment (Tested on macOS M1+Intel)

entry.summary: Install HomeBrew ## Install xcode utils xcode-select --install ## Install Brew /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" ## Check that everything is Ok brew doctor ## To update HomeBrew brew update To update/upgrade a brew package just run : brew reinstall PACKAGE_NAME Add HomeBrew to Your Path HBP=`brew --prefix` export PATH=$HBP/bin:$P...
